dmca.title: Google Image DMCA - Jennifer Aniston
dmca.body:
A. FREDRIC LEOPOLD*
Louis P. PETRICH
EDWARD A. RUTTENBERG
VINCENT COX
DONALD R. GORDON
WALTER R. SADLER
DANIEL M. MAYEDA**
ROBERT S. GUTIERREZ
THOMAS J. PEISTRUP
*Also admitted in New York
**Also admitted in the District of Columbia

LAW FFICES 
LEOPOLD, PETRICH & SMITH
A PROFESSIONAL CORPORATION
www.lpsla.com
Author's E-MaiL: eruttenberg@lpsla.com

March 15, 2007

SUITE 3110 
2049 CENTURY PARK EAST 
LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90067-3274 

TELEPHONE: (310) 277-3333 
FACSIMILE: (310) 277-7444 

GORDON E. YOUNGMAN (1903-1983) 
ROBERT P. MYERS (1903-1983) 
 
OF COUNSEL: 
RICHARD HUNGATE 
JOEL MCCABE SMITH
LORALEE SUNDRA 

File No.: 03386.0114 

CONFIDENTIAL LEGAL NOTICE 
NOT FOR PUBLICATION 

Via E-Mail:

removals@google.com

Via Fax (650-963-3255) & U.S. Mail
 
GOOGLE IMAGES
c/o Google Inc. 
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View CA 94043
 
Re: Demand for Immediate Removal of Infringing Photographs of Jennifer Aniston

To the Publishers of the "Google Images" Website:

I am the attorney for Universal Pictures ("Universal"), copyright owner of the motion picture THE BREAK-UP.

In accordance with Section 512 of the Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. Section 512, this constitutes a formal takedown request for infringing material located at the following addresses, all of which infringe copyrighted material from Universal's motion picture THE BREAK-UP:

1. http://images.google.co.uk/imgres?imgurl=http://www.24horaslibre.com/data/notipix/ Jennifer-annistontopless.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.24horaslibre.com/espectaculos/1173543872.php&h=203&w=276&sz=33&hl=en&start=57&tbnid=zsgl8fcmjY6QgM:&tbnh=84&tbnw=114&prey=/images%3Fq%3Dtopless%2Baniston%26start%3D40%26gbv%3D2%26ndsp%3D20%26svnum%3D10%26h1%3Den%26safe%3Doff%26sa%3DN

2.All similar images of Jennifer Aniston taken from Choc Magazine;

3.All images of Jennifer Aniston from the motion picture THE BREAK-UP.

Universal has a good faith belief that the uses of the material in this manner are not authorized by it, and that the statements in this notification are accurate. By my signature below, I declare under penalty of perjury that (1) I am authorized to act on behalf of Universal, (2) Universal is the owner of the exclusive right to copy and prepare derivative works from the copyrighted work listed above, and (3) these rights have been infringed by the referenced material.

By this letter, you have actual knowledge and awareness of facts and circumstances from which infringing activity is apparent. Demand is therefore made that you expeditiously remove or disable access to the material referenced above.

Please govern yourself accordingly. In the event that you choose not to remove the infringing material expeditiously, then Universal intends to file legal action against you. In that event, as a courtesy to you, please advise me of the manner in which you would prefer service of process to be made upon you, and I will do my best to comply with your request. Absent such advice from you, I will simply make service upon you as provided by law.

This letter is a confidential legal communication regarding Universal's rights and is not for publication. Nor is this letter intended as a complete statement of the facts or law as they pertain to this matter.
Nothing in this letter is meant to waive, nor may be construed as waiving, any rights held by Universal, all of which are expressly reserved.

Sincerely,

EDWARD A. RUTTENBERG

EAR:kkt

cc:	Carolyn Hampton, Esq.
David Burg, Esq.
Ted Ragsac, Esq.
